name: Phil's Contract
storyline: You play as a short, stubby cursed office worker from hell who wants nothing but to be free. Being very dissatisfied with his current standing, and having to do the same bullshit menial tasks over and over again, he SNAPS and escapes from hell. Only for his boss to get extremely fucking pissed and putting a curse on where Phil resides, turning everything against him. He must break the curse and destroy the contract in which it all began..
summary: Phil's Contract is a 2D platformer with fast-paced movement with an emphasis bunny-hopping and beat 'em up-esque combat. Featuring charming, yet grimy pixel art inspired from the likes of flash animations.
